Title: The Provision of Occupational Health Services
Description:
The Department of Health's (DH) Occupational Health Service (OHS) contract will cover occupational health services and risk assessment provision.
The services shall be provided as required to all Department of Health employees and prospective employees.
The Contractor shall develop and maintain effective partnership working with other health & well-being providers whether internal or external and promote the services available to staff.  This should include, but is not limited to, the Charity for Civil Servants and the Department's Employee Assistance Programme.
The Contractor shall ensure that its staff are appropriately qualified and experienced.  This includes for the OH Physician Membership of the Faculty of Occupational Medicine or equivalent and for a OH Advisor a diploma or degree in OH Nursing or equivalent.

This procurement was run via a Framework Mini Competition and is now awarded and closed.
